**[BudgetNode](https://budgetnode.com)** is a brand of Access Internet Ltd (Company Number: _10219199_).

Our aim is to provide good quality services and support without the high price tag.

All services come with a 7 day money back guarantee if the service is not as described. We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card (via 2Checkout), and Bitcoin.

Order today and have your disk doubled for free! Get **120GB** on the 2GB RAM Special for only $4/month when paid yearly.

Promo code: 

**DOUBLEDISK**  

Terms:

    1 use per customer.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Addons**:

    Additional IPv4: $1/month or $10/year  
    cPanel: $13.00/month (LA) / $14.00/month (VA)
<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Features**
-

* 100Mbps or 1Gbps Port Speed (depending on plan)
* Free Inbound Bandwidth
* Delegated IPv4 Space
* Delegated IPv6 Space
* 40Gbps (LA) or 50Gbps (VA) DDoS Mitigation
* Edge firewall rules possible (block or ratelimit protocols).
* OpenVZ Virtualization
* Instant Provisioning (subject to fraud screening)
* SolusVM Control Panel
* Instant rDNS Control (both IPv4 and IPv6)
* TUN/TAP, PPP, GRE, FUSE, & SIT Support
* Operating Systems: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, OpenSUSE, Scientific Linux

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Hardware**
-

Services are provisioned on the following hardware:

* Intel Xeon E3-1271v3 CPUs
* 32GB DDR3 ECC RAM
* Enterprise 1TB & 2TB SATA-3 6Gb/s Drives
* Adaptec 2405 RAID Controller (VA)
* Supermicro 4-bay Hotswap Chassis  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

_Network Information_:

Information about our locations can be seen [**here**](https://budgetnode.com/network).

**Los Angeles, CA, USA**:

_Test IPv4_: 172.82.152.3  
_Test IPv6_: 2607:3f00:12:1::eab3  

**Ashburn, VA, USA**

_Test IPv4_: 45.35.130.75  
_Test IPv6_: 2604:6600:2002:2::8629:215  

These offers are based out of the LA Telecom facility in Downtown Los Angeles, and InfoRelay facility in Ashburn, Virginia. SSAE 16 Type I and SAS70 Type II Certification.  

**Bandwidth carriers**:

_Ashburn, VA, USA_: 
`Zayo and Tinet. Telia and Cogent soon. All routes optimized by Noction Intelligent Routing.`

_Los Angeles, CA, USA_: 
`PCCW, Cogent, Colo@ (QuadraNet + GTT + Cogent + Hibernia + Zayo + Any2 peering).`

_Here's a picture of our servers in Ashburn_:

![](http://i.imgur.com/bo75XlJ.jpg)


**Terms**:

No CPU intensive tasks (burst allowed), no SPAM/bulk mail, no warez or pirated content. Nothing illegal in the USA or UK. Please read the full [Terms of Use](https://budgetnode.com/tos).
